DOC.brief_summary: This single arm study assess safety effect response rate combination rituximab chlorambucil previously untreated participant B-cell chronic lymphocytic leukemia . Participants receive 6 monthly cycle combination treatment , follow 6 cycle chlorambucil alone . Rituximab administer Day 1 cycle , dose 375 milligram per square meter ( mg/m^2 ) intravenously ( IV ) Cycle 1 , 500 mg/m^2 subsequent cycle , chlorambucil administer Days 1-7 cycle dose 10 mg/m^2/day per oral ( PO ) .
